scripts.preview: pnpm run build && pnpm dlx serve out -l 3000

dependenciesComments.next: Version 16 is not being used yet as of 10/22/2025 because there was a bug that was preventing static export when using next-export-optimize-images. It seems like a simple bug though. It should be addressed in https://github.com/dc7290/next-export-optimize-images/issues/1249.
